description: Detects office suit applications communicating to target systems on uncommon ports
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Other ports can be used, apply additional filters accordingly
name: Suspicious Office Outbound Connections
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\excel.exe" OR "*\\outlook.exe" OR "*\\powerpnt.exe" OR "*\\winword.exe" OR "*\\wordpad.exe" OR "*\\wordview.exe") AND (NOT destination.port:("139" OR "443" OR "445" OR "80")))
